data.title: Raymond's Reviews Index
data.text:
Up to Eric's Home Page Up to Site Map 10 Mar 1999

Raymond's Reviews `Classic'

The original series, 1990-1992. #196-199 were never posted; #199 includes all the extra reviews in the pipeline when I shut down the column in early 1992 due to press of work.

(Note: some of these dates are wrong. When you see a date earlier than the one above it, assume it's scrambled. No, I don't know how this happened -- some ar(1) screwup.)

Codes used in the entries are described here.

(For convenience, here's a link to my commentary on the Encyclopedia of SF which describes the experience and knowledge-base from which these reviews were written).
